pkgmetadata.longdescription: Models for Spatially Correlated Data // Fits the autologistic model described in Besag's famous 1974 paper on auto- models http://www.jstor.org/stable/2984812. Fits a multicategory generalization of the autologistic model when there are more than 2 response categories. Provides support for both asymptotic and bootstrap confidence intervals. For full model descriptions and a guide to the use of this package, please see the vignette.
